attributes.action: support the Still Human Still Here campaign, which is dedicated to highlighting the plight of tens of thousands of refused asylum seekers who are being forced into abject poverty in an attempt to drive them out of the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition that
 
• There is an end to the threat and use of destitution as a tool of Government policy against asylum seekers.

• Refused asylum seekers receive continued financial support and accommodation as provided during the asylum process and are granted permission to work until such a time as they have left the UK or been granted leave to remain. 

• Refused asylum seekers have continued full access to healthcare and education throughout the same period.

rejection.details: You should request a specific action, such as a change in policy.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
